endpoints.description: Retrieve the list of all material specifications uploaded by users.
Submit a new material specification for validation and processing.
Fetch a specific compliance report generated by the system for review.
Integrate a sensor into the system for real-time data collection.
Retrieve a list of industry standards against which materials are validated.
Get the analysis results of a specified material specification.
Record a new product quality metric obtained from manufacturing processes.
Update the quality thresholds for real-time monitoring.
Retrieve all active alerts and notifications related to quality or compliance.
Remove material specifications that are outdated or no longer relevant.
